reset_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the game?
window_confirm_change_life_total: Are you sure you want to continue with these life totals?
window_confirm_change_player_count: Are you sure you want to continue with this number of players?
window_confirm_reset_game: Are you sure you want to reset the game?
window_confirm_reset_local_storage: This will clear saved settings and game state from local storage. Continue?
allow_negative_life_help: Player is not marked dead when life ≤ 0
allow_negative_life_global_help: When enabled, no player is marked dead for having ≤ 0 life (unless per-player override is off)
prevent_screen_sleep_help: Prevent the device screen from turning off while the app is active
about_thanks: Huge thanks to Michael Bourkas for Lifetap, this is a personal clone, produced simply to practice and learn and experiment with Svelte, TypeScript etc.
